website_summaries.verdict: Night vision, two-way audio, and pan/tilt/zoom functions make this camera a solid, inexpensive choice.
pros: Two-way audio to talk to your dog if necessary
Motion sensor alarm sends you alerts directly if something is amiss
Moveable camera and night vision mean you can keep track of your dog at all times

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to download the App and now wonderful to watch our babies when we are not at home. Feel so much more happy to see them happy when we not at home. The sound quality is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johannes van Schalkwyk

customer_reviews.title: good quality product, but hard to find replacement parts for
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and quality for the price! However, good luck getting any replacement parts if you need them- the cord is really hard to find in case it gets chewed up, and i cannot get the seller to respond to messages, so i will have to buy an entire new camera bc the cord replacement cannot be found anywhere Update: The seller got back to me and sent me a new cable that my dog chewed through! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Holly M. Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous based on reviews, but I absolutely LOVE this camera. Both my husband and I have it set up to view on our phones. It was super simple to set up if you read the instructions. We have one set up inside, and we just purchased a 2nd to set up outside. The one inside has been great while our oldest daughter babysits and we can see what they are up to while we're away. It's also great to be able to work in my office upstairs while the baby is in the swing downstairs. I cannot say enough great things about this camera, especially for the price. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 2 cameras. Talk about next level with an affordable price. Not only can I watch my pet I also can feel secure about intruders in my home please buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dubbz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this camera! I originally purchased to see my dog on the couch but actually caught my husband and the kindergarten teacher on it instead. As you can see the quality for the price is fantastic!! The audio part is great and as you can see by the picture my husband was definitely able to hear and understand what I was saying. I will spear everyone the video because it’s not good for little ears but trust me when I tell you I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPYWARE
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because there was spyware on the app. I refused to download it on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It was very simple to set up and it's easy to use. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that both my wife and I can keep an eye on our dog from our phones. The camera works great. It was just what we needed for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I see someone else’s camera
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first - you can view and move the camera from the app, as well as talk. However after a few days something went haywire and now my account is viewing someone else’s camera (which is super creepy). I’ve tried resetting my camera and setting it up again but that doesn’t work. I’m going to try canceling my account and returning the product. I’d suggest spending a bit more money on a well known product with a reputable customer support line.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Pease Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed, we can see what’s going on in the house and hear everything too, we can even speak to the dogs. Easy set up, easy to use, and you can see in the dark and move the camera around on your phone, PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Busutil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to keep an eye on my dog throughout the day to make sure he wasn’t chewing on anything. I really like the camera, very clear picture and easy set up. Price is very good as well. I will be buying another one for upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: love it I can check in with my dogs and make sure they are ok while away from the house. I can talk to them and they can actually hear you!!! Best product and the price you can’t beat!!! I was originally gonna go with the one that depended treats but with four dogs in the house this is way better cause I don’t have to worry about them fighting over dog treats. So glad I went with this camera..
customer_reviews.author: Ayden

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Works well with the app
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Works well with the app. But mine makes random noises and it makes me wonder if someone is watching me...
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug 23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product  !
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. Setup took about 10 minutes per camera. Picture quality is awesome considering the price point. Plus the voice feature is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Matyson

customer_reviews.title: Bad WiFi connection. Slow response
customer_reviews.text: I still don’t understand how this product has positive reviews.It never connects to the internet. The image always freezes. It doesn’t motion detect and the voice command is terrible. I never really write negative reviews but this one was well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W

customer_reviews.title: software for product tagged as Spyware
customer_reviews.text: Phone blocks software because it considers it to be spyware. I tried the camera on the computer and I must say the picture is not great. I now have a camera that I can't use as intended due to security. I should have saved for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonToast

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera for the price. The main downside is the controls are difficult to use (only pans in small increments by swiping in the app, doesn't always read the swipe motion correctly). The speaker is neat, and the motion detection is cool, but our cats trigger it too much! we got a 64gb sd card to store everything, but due to the super sensitivity of the motion detection it doesn't really make any sense as a security device...
customer_reviews.author: xiaojuan zheng

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Instructions, Once Set Up It's Great
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit for me to get it set up, because the 3rd party app used to connect to the camera gives different instructions than the camera gives in its booklet. Turns out, if you follow the ones in the booklet it's easy to get working! And the picture quality is fabulous, especially for the price point. My wife and I love it to peek in on our pup while he sleeps!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Bilodeau

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy save the frustration
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy... never connects always loading.. extremely frustrating. Im returoning as we speak. Not sure how amazon can sell this
customer_reviews.author: too the extreme

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely a little difficult to set up. It probably took about 30-45 minutes to set up, and that was with some serious trouble shooting. The instructions gave some ideas on how to fix the problem, which was that the app was saying the camera is offline when it wasnt, but I eventually got it working. The night vision feature is good, but the camera makes a little clicking noise and the red lights turn on when you use it in the dark, wakes my dog up everytime and I just want to check on her. It's been on for two days now and has been working to par. I would recommend it for the price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pet cam
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay connected to the internet or our cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglehead69

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how easy and affordable it is to have an in-home pet cam!! I have my phone on at my desk all day and get to watch my pups and even talk to them! Unfortunately, they mostly sleep, but still, its fun to be able to check in on the fur kids! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jokermtb

customer_reviews.title: Good Camrea not so good speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera great range works will in the light and dark. And it has a decent microphone. The speaker that allows you to talk is not very good. Yes sound does come out but often times it is very slow and quiet you can't quite make out what is being said even over a fast connection. But since this is much cheaper then 90% of all other cameras and I can check in on my dog from anywhere I have cell service it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Meeks-Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A flaky product with zero technical support.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time on this camera. It may look cute, but that's about all it has going for it. If you're lucky enough to get one to work, then great, but more likely you'll find yourself beating your head against the wall trying to deal with cheap hardware, amateurish software, and "technical support" that amounts to telling you to watch youtube videos that'll walk you through a setup process you've already got memorized after numerous factory resets of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gravitas Shortfall

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I used a wired connection since I had trouble figuring out the wireless setup. Once I did, the product works great. The picture quality is really clear. Night time is great as well. The camera picks up a lot of light which really helps picture quality. The ability to remotely re-aim the camera works very well. I love this product. It helps me keep an eye on our new kitty. I would recommend this product and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DanDLT

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I like that its easy to set up, app easily installed and sign up, view dogs and hear sounds, get motion detection, and great view with 360 camera. I don't like how ever at times the video lags, I can't schedule video records without buying a subscription? (I need to look into this more) I would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Oakford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item. Got when my dog had surgery and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. Got when my dog had surgery and now I get to check in on her all the time. Set up was a bit tricky though but left the house came home and it automatically started working. We live far out so maybe it was the wifi connection.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Best Money I Ever Spent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. For the price you cannot beat it's quality and performance. I have a cat who has been going thru some health issues over the last months (thankfully on the mend now) but knowing that I could check on him while I was at work or just out is sooooooooooo comforting. I can check on him to make sure he's ok and not in any distress. The picture quality is great (HD even better). The sound is a little iffy.. .. sometimes not so clear but it's more important that I can see my pet. I would highly recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: S. Martino

customer_reviews.title: does not stay connected so I can view
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible camera. It will not stay connected to the internet. I constantly have to re boot it. I bought it so I could watch my dogs while I was out of town. I was able to watch them for the first 5 minutes after leaving. Then nothing. I can hear them but I can't see them. My whole entire trip. So frustrating. So not buy. Spend the money and get something higher quality. So you don't have to buy another camera, like I have to now!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work, so I can see who is coming in when I'm in the back room. It was easy to install, I can bring it up on my desktop and my phone. It works when I'm off premises. I do not use the voice function much. You can use the phone app to move the camera around, you can set the level of sensitivity, it's pointed at the door, so at the highest sensitivity it was picking up cars going by, you can set it to give you an alert when there is movement (great for after hours). It's simple enough for me to figure out and use. The picture is very clear at night as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Steinkopf

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I tried to configure the camera in all 3 ways that your (badly phrased) instructions suggested: wifi, hotspot, ethernet but once the device is added the camera won't start. Unless I get reimbursed for this product , I will report the seller(s) to the Better Business Bureau.
customer_reviews.author: EID

customer_reviews.title: App is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Camera was not crazy hard to set up, although the instructions were kind of weird and you can tell not proper English, which is whatever. But just as a lot of other reviews said, the app is horrible. It never connects, I got it to connect once and the speaker didn't go through (which the speaker did work on the camera because the other words from the camera itself were coming through just fine). It kept disconnecting from the internet, and loudly saying every time it connected or disconnected, so that was a bit disturbing to have happen all night. Overall, good idea, I really did want it to workout, but this one just did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes is doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It was ok to set up. You need to actually plug it in to your router to set it up. I could not do it using wi-fi. Sometimes it works great and sometimes it says, not connected to the Internet. Also my phone keeps saying that the App that you have to install on your phone to connect the camera to your phone is Spywear. I just went to reset the password and my computer says, connection not secure. So just research it, or you won't be the only one looking at your pets with that camera.
customer_reviews.author: Franco B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great functionalities, responsive post-sales service
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! Mobile App supports WeChat login, which is a game changer to me because it makes it quite easy for Chinese moms (including my mom) to use. Camera view is wide enough and motion range is big. Night vision is very clear and it turn on/off based on the brightness of the environment. The product comes with a wall mount set. A few App user experience can be improved, for instance, camera motion control gesture is not consistent vertically and horizontally. Support reps are very responsive and have collected my opinions. Looking forward to further improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Longfei Wang

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I was always concerned leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot.. When I got Tooge, things got much better! Tooge sent me notifications to my phone when he was crying, so I would log on and talk to him right away. This changed everything!! My puppy knows I'm always there, so his separation anxiety is getting better. He cries less, and I feel much more relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby love candy

customer_reviews.title: Is someone else watching?
customer_reviews.text: The camera works fine however like another reviewer stated the camera clicks frequently making me feel like someone else is watching. Also I have the camera set up to view crate only and today when I logged on it was pointed towards couch.... could it have been moved on accident by my cat maybe but still makes me feel uneasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For those with nerves of steel only. Great....if and when they work
customer_reviews.text: I am a techy kinda girl. That being said, these things are THE most NON-user-friendly devices I've ever had the misfortune of trying to connect. If you plan to do a direct connect with ethernet at your desk you might be fine. If you wish to use them around the house to keep an eye on pet/kids/for security, wirelessly; sweet baby Cheeses....get some meds from your doctor before tackling this connection nightmare. Now I must say adieu- am off and am late for my straight jacket fitting at the psych ward that is needed from SETTING THESE @$%#^ CAMERAS UP.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schware

customer_reviews.title: Don't ever buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cheap for a reason, the app it makes you download is a pain so it doesn't even work right when you try to use it. My camera suddenly told me I had the wrong password so even after resetting it and using the factory password it's still coming up as incorrect. Now this thing is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mitrani

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this thing, I have it set up so I can see both the front and back doors as well as check on the dog while I'm at work, motion detection is incredibly sensitive even on low so I only turn in on when I leave. Quality isn't the greatest but for the price, it's fine, better than a lot of high dollar cameras out there. The speak function, zoom, and movement all work great. The night vision is great. My only complaint is that it's incredibly hard to hear if you are listening through the camera, and that I couldn't figure out how to connect a second phone. Overall, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: I bought a “pre-owned like new” version of this camera. The app seems easy to use and the camera looks brand new, but it won’t even turn on. I tested the AC adapter, and that is functioning, so they essentially sent me a broken camera. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice doorstop!  Not worth much else.
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. It took forever to get it set up for the first time. The audio never would work. The video was good and the ability to pan the camera worked well...for a while. It stopped working so I reinstalled the app on my phone and reset the camera back to factory settings. It will no longer recognize the Internet and I am unable to get it to work again. Also the app that is used for this, called Happy See, shows up on my antiviral software as containing spyware. I can't return it because it worked for the first 30 days and I am now five days past the time that I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Carey-Walden

customer_reviews.title: Generally very good, but not for chickens.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this, but not because it was bad in a general way. I wanted something with which to observe chickens in a coop at night. Unfortunately, chickens can see in the infrared spectrum, and this (probably the same as other similar devices) uses a infrared "light" to illuminate night scenes. That keeps the chickens awake, so, not good for me. However, in general, and the basis of giving five stars, it seemed good. Easy to configure (in multiple ways) easy to control with the free app, and with decent enough picture quality. The night picture was great, unfortunately just not obtained in a way that worked for me. Very grateful for Amazon return policies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera that wasn't bottom of the line, but also nothing terribly fancy so that I could check-in on my dog (listen & speak to) throughout the day while at work or out of the house. This is a great middle of the road camera if you're not needing anything super high-tech, although I have been pleasantly surprised by it. The motion detection is great and you can opt to have your phone alert you when there's any motion. You can also change the level of motion detection. It's also extremely useful when you're away from your house and want to check-in on things. Again, it does the job for the price you pay for it!
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING! Please get this. We bought one of this to see what our four legged babies are up to while we’re at work and oh my God does it make your day so much better. Within days of installing the first one I bought another to put in another area of the house. Picture is great, you can move the camera around and have a great range of view. I love being able to use the speak and listen features. I could imagine this also being great if you have kids or just want to keep an eye on your house while away.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Leviso

customer_reviews.title: Hacked my phone !!! Do not buy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought camera to monitor my pet . My phone was hacked within 12 hrs of installing the device . I called Apple & they had me change all passwords & bank pw & credit card pw & email pw .my phone provider said the camera is still monitoring me . Worst nightmare . I CALLED AMAZON . They insisted they would take the product down . Hope they will soon !!!!! Do not buy this product . I’ve never ever had my phone hacked b4 ever until 12 hrs after installing this device .
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: It can only be used as a paperweight as it will not connect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Tooge Pet Camera I have purchased. The first connected easily and I purchased a second assuming it would be the same. I had sat it aside during the holidays and just recently pulled it out to connect it. It will not connect. I have tried every option. It does not have. CID # to connect it like the other. Instead it has an alphanumeric ID that cannot be entered in CID. I wish I could return it, but since I can’t, I want to warn potential customers of the lack of consistency in product and the possibility that you may receive an absolutely useless product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: it has good definition
customer_reviews.text: I like it since it has good definition. I can watch my baby so easily. and it looks so nice and cute. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost, keeps an eye on the fur babies!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to monitor my fur babies while gone. Honestly I struggled getting it to work...finally called a tech savvy friend to get it going for me. She got it functioning. Didnt know what kind of distance I'd get but holy cow, at least 100 miles!! Could see and hear them. When they started barking I was able to tell them to quiet down, freaked them out enough to be quiet!! Score!!! Went to Arizona, same trouble getting it to work, my tech friend trouble shot over the phone...back working!! Win!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Picture Quality after 2 Days
customer_reviews.text: This camera only worked for a couple days, before the picture quality went out. There were lines through the video, so that I couldn’t really tell what was happening. I tried moving the camera, resetting it up, etc. and still I couldn’t see a clear picture. Also when you speak into the microphone and have it come out of the speaker, it is very robotic and your voice is pretty much unrecognizable. From all of the typos in the instructions and the terrible reviews on the app, I should’ve known this would video camera would be of low quality. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rae

customer_reviews.title: Snapshot and Record don't work
customer_reviews.text: LIke the live view. But Snapshot and Record don't work. Amazon chat to fix it was a waste of time. Vendor gave 3 suggestions that I had already tried, then offered to send $15 on a $40 item and not return it. I want to return it, but the return window was so short, I couldn't. Also, it isn't compatible with my Synology NAS system. I didn't know any of this until Christmas. Bummer. Lessons learned. I will purchase another brand that is compatible and open the box the day I get it to make sure all of the features work.
customer_reviews.author: lakeforklady

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Issues
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and great quality just sucks it has to be connected to the router at all times. our WiFi is "to powerful" for the camera so it needs to be plugged into it if we want it to work. Lucky for us our dog cage is next to the router just wish I would've known that before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney D

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, will be returning. I wanted to love it because the majority of the reviews were positive. But mine must’ve been faulty. Wouldn’t connect to my WiFi and I tried all steps, multiple times. I tried for three days straight. My boyfriend tried. His friends tried. We followed each step perfectly and then once it got started configuring, it failed every time. I even googled ways to fix this issue and nothing worked. Jealous it worked for some people because it’s so cheap compared to other cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out how to get it to work with my phone and the app. I got the Wyze camera instead. I plugged that in and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: KAZ75

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with the same thing I bought less than a year ago and quality is poor to begin with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to one that I had bought a few months ago, but there's a new app for the new one. The new camera doesn't work with the old app. The older camera (by old I mean a few months) doesn't work with the new app. Multiple apps for multiple cameras is not a well thought out design or business plan. Even if I was willing to deal with that, what happens if I want a third one in future....a third app? No thanks. Also, the quality is subpar...it's good enough but there's better options for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! A great security and you can feel at ease knowing your home is safe!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to keep an eye out on our fur babies while we are away on our trip and it worked perfectly! We ended up ordering 2. And LOVE them! We even use them to keep and eye on our kids when we are not at home! Only problem is that sometimes it doesn’t always stay connected to the internet even though our other technology things have no problems. But its not a big deal to us. Love this product and if we had a need for more we would buy it again! Already recommended to a friends and family members!
customer_reviews.author: waynett k iokepa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! This camera really is top notch! I haven't had any issues whatsoever. I really like the feature where you can speak to your pet and move the camera around through your phone (and it has night vision) ! Love the fact that you can schedule recordings and even turn on motion detection to get alerts. Such a great camera for the price. I was a bit skeptical because of some reviews but so glad I bought it. It's just like a Furbo except it doesn't dispense treats. Overall recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Steph G

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I am really appreciating this camera right now. I love the night vision settings as it allows me to see my dogs and keep an eye on the door. I can even double check if I locked it. There is a delay in the feed but nothing major. I am grateful that I can check on my dogs while I’m working since they both have health issues. The mic is great; it picks up the sound in the room. I still need to test out the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sue LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Best investment  for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I found that this is a great camera! It is very easy to install, very easy to use and control via the free smartphone app, and has given me great peace of mind when I need to leave my dogs at home alone for a bit. The two-way audio comes in handy when I have "dog sitters" in to care for my fur-boys. We can talk to each other and the dogs can hear my voice as well. I have had this since August 26th, and I have absolutely nothing but good things to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great when it is working. Unfortunately it frequently disconnects from the wifi and has to be manually reset in order to reconnect. I am considering buying a smart plug so I can reset the camera when I am not home.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't exactly what I had expected but does the job. Was difficult to get hooked up and paired with my cell phone and the only way I could get the camera connected was through a LAN line run directly to the router. When I purchased I thought it would not have to be connected to the router but aw well. I wanted to see what my puppies do when I'm at work...nothing, absolutely nothing lol
customer_reviews.author: micah welker

customer_reviews.title: Great live streaming camera!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to keep an eye on my dog while I'm away. It was easy to set up and works like a dream with the app. I have the android app version. Audio and video quality just fine, press to talk, screen capture, and panning all work great as well. I also really appreciate the no wifi/2G/3G warning. Very reasonably priced device!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera to keep an eye out on our fur baby and I was super disappointed in it. The set-up was very difficult to understand and wouldn't connect with my phone. When I called for Customer Service help, they just kept spinning me in circles and no definite answers were given. The customer service representatives were not friendly either, they made me feel stupid that I didn't understand how "easy it was to setup". I recommend finding a different camera for you to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hulsman

customer_reviews.title: Confusing set up, doesn’t work with 2 cameras
customer_reviews.text: This is second one I bought. It worked perfectly however once I added this second one the first one stopped working. I checked the questions and someone had same issue but customer service never responded to it. This defeats the purpose of having two. I will revise this review if issue is fixed but for now I’m not too pleased. I use the happy see mate app for this one. There is also just a happy see app - I dont know the difference. Very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: JujuP

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep an eye on our grandfather who is home alone for the most of the day but also has a home aide that comes in and cares for him. He had a fall once and the home aide couldn't get in so we had no idea what was happening until we got there. So far, it's been working great. The fact that we can pan the room and it has 2 way audio is awesome. The mounting part was not hard and came with all of the necessary hardware. I was able to hook it up and have it running through the app in a matter of minutes, the instructions were very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Miss_Mille

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works well. Replacement parts difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter to make sure her dog was OK, and it worked great. The only problem is when the dog chewed the cord and she tried to find a replacement, she is unable to find one that fits. She has looked in local stores as well as ordered on Amazon without finding one that will stay in place. She Has also contacted the company to get a replacement cord which did not fit properly. The camera was good, but finding replacement parts has been difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Darci B.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for the price. Has an app, decent picture quality, and is easy to set up. Definitely better than I expected for the price, but it's not fancy because it is very cheap. It is grainy, the speaker quality is super bad, and it needs a lot of light to not be in night mode. But for 20-something dollars, it's a great deal. You can also share the camera link with others so my husband has it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a week now and it is great. We just got a puppy and have been using this a few hours each day to keep an eye on the lil' guy. The image is nice and clear on my phone and I like the capability to move/rotate it. Be sure you download the right app that the camera calls for. My IT bud also suggested creating a guest network to link this up to instead of linking it to your normally used networks. Not sure what security is in place. The night vision is a little sensitive but not really an issue as the view is still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Veebear

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price...easy set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 6 months now and I’m still as impressed as when it arrived! Picture is grainy but for $30 it is plenty for me to check in and see that my elderly dog is doing ok. The app for your phone is easy to download and very straightforward to use. When setting up the camera it prompted me in an Asian language from the sound of it but the directions in the how to pamphlet made set up a breeze even not knowing what was being said. I’m sure it is a setting that can be adjusted...I just have not investigated further.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer loves Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected..
customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality is good, including night vision and motion detection. Everything worked until I tried to access the camera from my phone after leaving my house... it refused to open it kept saying I had to connect to the same Wi-Fi in order for it to connect. It's pointless if I can't access it away from home.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera - not sure how the SD card works
customer_reviews.text: Good value for this camera: love that it has night vision and motion detection. However, I haven't figured out yet how to get it to record on the SD card rather than just on my phone because the manual doesn't have anything about it and I have to dig around the app to learn more. Someday I'll figure it out. Also, would love it if they could allow me to change the Notification on my phone to something other than the very loud siren sound.
customer_reviews.author: AsiaUser

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Being away from my puppy was hard since he is still very small. It was easy to install on my android and on my computer. I give this item a 4 star because the speaker and microphone speaker isn't the best quality. When speaking into the speaker it is not that loud or very clear. When hearing audio it is very low. I've adjusted the volume setting but it's still the same. Besides that this product is amazing. I've ordered a second one to install on a different place in the house to have a better view of the whole lower level. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: LadyStang

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this would have been a great device to have, however me; my boyfriend, and friends have all tried to walk through the tedious set up instructions numerous times, and have never been able to figure out the last couple of instructions! So annoying! So it sits in a box collecting dust. Everything seems to work, it’s just the damn instructions are ridiculous! Good luck if you attempt it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item as I spent hours trying to setup and configure the device with no luck. The app kept telling me to activate the cameras hotspot but then then it would say no internet connection. Each time I tried to tether the device's hotspot to my home internet it would take me back to step one. I have set up plenty of smart devices in my home with no problem this was by far the most confusing.
customer_reviews.author: J Vacanti

customer_reviews.title: Great product exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was more than a little skeptical about the product because it was so cheap .. but if you're looking for a camera for your house that you can move orientation, has night vision, that you can hear through and speak through then this is the one for you super cheap has been working awesome exceeded my expectations and I definitely would buy more I wish they had a completely wireless ( this one has a power cord, the Wi-Fi is Wireless goes without saying) version that was rated for outside I would be on it like a hot second.
customer_reviews.author: Heythor

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: i like this camera. This is third camera I bought. I returned last one. Because it cant connect when im outside. Only can view the video with same WiFi. What a sad camera. ;( this one is batter then last one. I have to say. This is most easy to set up. Only u need to do is connect the power-download the app-go mobile wifi setting click the camera hot-pot-return to app-set a passcode then u good to ues!! U don need to push some buttons and wait the red or green light flash or not. That’s so nicely! I only cast 5mins from opne the camera to watch cats fight from the camera. :)
customer_reviews.author: jiamingdong

customer_reviews.title: The app to make this work is non-functioning
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera as a Christmas present. When I excitedly went to get it set up. I learned the horrible truth. This camera's app has a two-star rating on the app store. Why you ask? Because it doesn't work. I was completely unable to get the camera set up with wifi. It wouldn't recognize that I had connected to the cameras wifi and it would not allow me to select a different wifi network. Look at the newer reviews on this camera. It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gallacher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty meh product
customer_reviews.text: The app you download is whack, but the account and camera is easy to install and setup if you have any amount of tech experience. If not it could take you awhile so just call the grandkids over. The camera responds very well when on the same wifi network, but is very sluggish when out of the house. The microphone only works sometimes on mine too so it’s useless in that respect. Helped me keep an eye on the pups while at work though to see who was pooing in the kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Gibbs.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch my dog during the day and it does an amazing job. you can talk to him and i can see my whole living/kitchen area with the rotation of the camera. Night vision is not perfect clear but it is clear enough to still see everything with ease. I got my 3 coworkers to buy one for their house as well and they use it to watch the babysitters and their pets as well. Defiantly one of my best purchases
customer_reviews.author: Courtney kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic little camera! I bought it to keep an eye on my puppy in her crate while she’s recovering from her big girl surgery, and I like that I can talk to her through it. My roommate and I tested it and the voice is pretty clear. The picture is good and the app is super handy. It’s not the highest tech nanny cam you could possibly buy, but that’s why it’s such a good price. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it for a few days. So far so good. It was not the easiest to connect to wifi. Do yourself a favor, start off hardwire with ethernet. Much easier to connect after. So far picture is great and camera working great. After I connected to wifi, had difficulty with smart tv running hulu and Netflix. I unplugged router and modem and it started working again. Be patient and have time to set the camera up. Loved the price, no subscription, live feed, expandable memory, 2 way talk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to be reset at least once a week!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these cameras. I really liked them at first and they worked great for about a month. Now I have to reset them at least once a week to be able to access them remotely. It's not my wifi, everything else works great. I'm going to have to find another brand to replace these with because I'm tired of not being able to access them because they have disconnected again. I do not recommend them at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a cheap camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond amazed by how great of quality this is for such a cheap camera! I was skeptical at first, but we went ahead and bought it last minute before we went on vacation to keep an eye on our house. Picture is clear during the day even the night vision. Although we had someone come check on our kitty while we were gone, buying these gave us an extra piece of mind knowing he was in good hands. It notified our phones immediately when there was a motion detection every time!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pet camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet camera. The picture quality is great and the sound as well. You can manage it and rotate the image with the app on your phone. However, I give it four stars because it can be a little difficult to connect with the internet. I have to plugin directly to the router box instead of using the wifi for it since I wasn't able to establish a connection. You can hear and talk through it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Vel

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Camera, GREAT Value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I set this up in our home last night. We use it to spy on our pup and two cats. For the $30 price tag, it is a no brainer! Great buy! You can listen in, speak to your pets, take a picture, record, and more! The attached photo is of my living room with no light on (during a rainy, dull day!) - so the quality of the picture is pretty good. Would definitely suggest this to anyone that wants to spy on their pet! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Power chord broken
customer_reviews.text: So annoyed, had this camera less than 30 days and the power chord doesnt work! I have 2 of this camera, the power chord on my other one works just fine, and I tried it on this one and it works. So the only problem is the faulty power chord provided with my second camera. But because the 30 day return time was literally YESTERDAY they wont send me a replacement chord, or swap my product.
customer_reviews.author: Jafazzini

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price point! It’s great to have if you have pets and you’re on vacation and want to check in! :) the video is very smooth and the night vision in great. It’s easy to set up and I love that the camera can rotate to give even more visibility around a room. It would feel more high quality if there weren’t words misspelled as you’re setting the camera up, but again for the price it’s hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie G.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a kitten and there are some days where I am gone for long shifts. I wanted something that would give me the piece of mind she wasn't stuck somewhere! I mounted this camera onto my wall using Command strips as to not put any holes in my wall but it does come with hardware to mount to wall. The night vision isn't too bad, but the overall picture quality on a normal sunny day is far more than I expected! I love that I can move the camera from the app to get a good view of the room. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HAD90

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing another!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this pet camera. I wasn’t sure if it would work without my phone being connected to the same WiFi at the same time, but it works perfectly! It even works great when me and my boyfriend are on the app at the same time. I work an hour away from home and can check in on my pup, talk to him, or listen to hear if he barks. I’ve even been in a different state and have been able to pull up this camera on my phone. Turned out to be such a great buy and will be purchasing another!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harmon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it’s so worth it!! A cheap, workinf camera! I have had no issues in the past few months! I love seeing my babies on my phone screen while I’m away from home. I read reviews and I saw some negative reviews which almost steered me away. I have had great luck with this camera and would buy again! It stays connected to WiFi, and you can move the camera with your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Amazing. Camera.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has knocked the camera over when I accidentally left It in the corner of the table and when I got home I was truly suprised it didn’t break! I’ve been putting it out of his reach and it’s been good. It’s good quality, I love that you can move it and zoom in through your phone. The best part is talking through the app and your dog looks at the camera confused lol. The price is great as well. I’m not going to lie I had trouble trying to set it up but I eventually figured it out, you just have to be good at reading instructions. I recommend this camera !
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second camera because we loved it so much!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great choice for keeping an eye on your pets while you're away. We have three senior dogs and I am thrilled that I can check on them while I'm out. The connection was easy and the picture is great. The only thing I don't like is the cord is too short for our ceilings - upon mounting it on the wall, the cord didn't reach the outlet. We have ten foot ceilings however, so this probably is not a problem for most. I simply bought an additional extension cord and it worked out fine. Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Benito Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this cam because the reviews seemed good and it didn’t break the bank. Not sure if it was just me or my internet but the instructions and connecting to WiFi was extremely difficult I had to connect it to an Ethernet cable and can only keep it in one place where my modem is. It doesn’t notify me of motion but you can speak through the app and move the camera around. At first you I could also hear what was going on but for some reason now I can’t. Overall it’s a decent camera and would recommend it if you just want to keep an eye on your dog/cat or so.
customer_reviews.author: Emizzzzle

customer_reviews.title: Get a different camera - not worth $20 even
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to keep an eye on my dogs & it Didn’t Work as well as I thought it would, Record option wasn’t available ( error message), Didn’t detect movement well ( detected everything or nothing) , no audio detection, the delay was too long in my opinion, screen would sometimes Go bad ( a glare or block or color would come up on screen) and it would stop working sometimes And I’d have to reset it ( all in less than a week)
customer_reviews.author: Frequent flyer miles

customer_reviews.title: Beyond happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and it was shipped and received in a timely manner. The quality of the product is great and if you follow the directions they have for you the set up is very easy. You have to make sure that your phone is upgraded and router meets the requirements for the product to work. I have had no problems with this product at all! It is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Must have! This is a great alternative if you can’t afford the expensive animals cameras. I have a puppy and I have to leave it alone a 3 days a week for almost 7-8hours and I was freaking out before, not knowing what she is doing. Now with this camera, I can check on her even when she is in her crate. I can zoom in on her, see if she is whining or not and it’s just helping me relax while I am away from her. A must have for new pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Software has lots of spyware
customer_reviews.text: Works well but software keeps getting flagged by my firewall as malicious and the software keeps trying to access internet websites that are flagged by firewall as spyware. If you do install software restrict it's access on hour phone and have a good firewall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love this is cat cam. It works perfectly. I had no trouble setting it up using the instruction booklet for 2.1 AP Hotspot the first method listed. It really works. I can rotate the camera and talk and listen from any location. We added to my hubby’s phone using the instructions for set up by QR code. I’m very happy with this product and the great price.
customer_reviews.author: sheela season

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to record
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get it to record. It doesn't support cloud recording, only recording to an SD card. I had an SD card - even formatted it with the app, but still no recording. There are only setup instructions, no operating instructions, and instructions are written in poor English. I am returning because I can't get it to do what I bought it for - to record when motion sensors are triggered.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2019!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is awesome! And you CANNOT beat the price! The picture is a little grainy from far away, but it’s got a phenomenal turning radius, I can almost see around my entire apartment (it’s quite small). I bought this to go on a trip over Christmas and wanted to check in on my cat. He comes right up to it all the time! Recommended it to 3 other people and they all love it too. App is super user-friendly and it’s very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Set up wasn't too tricky...good quality picture...best of all it freaked out my teenagers that I'll have a closer eye on them (and our kitchen) so no more, I didn't do it! (s) HAHA. Love that. Oh ya, and great for pets too ;) I haven't had any issues so far. The price was great and I like that it can be purchased individually and doesn't have to include some kind of monthly service aside from some way to connect to the internet. The camera itself is password protected so I'm not expecting to have any issues with anyone hacking into it. TIme will tell I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Cautiously optimistic
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the few weeks it lasted and then suddenly stopped. Spouse is an engineer so this is not an issue on our end. Just a complete DUD...and of course the return window had just closed. UPDATE: After leaving the review for product & seller, the seller reached out. When spouse took another shot at restarting it, it worked. No idea why. Worried this may be a pattern, but for now hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Botner

product_meta.title: TOOGE Pet Dog Camera Wireless Home Security Camera FHD WiFi Indoor Camera Pet Monitor Cat Camera Night Vision 2 Way Audio and Motion Detection
feature_bullets: 1. Quick 2.4G Wifi Connection --- Fast WiFi setup via mobile App on iPhone/Android smartphone/tablets(it can't support MAC). This wireless security camera with APP supports remote access via mobile App anywhere and anytime.Support 7/24 video recording.

2. Great Day/Night Vision & Clear Two Way Talking --- Intelligent IR-Cut switch ensures high quality images both day and night. 2 IR leds, night vision up to 16 feet in pitch dark. Hi-Fi intercom without noise, souffle and echo, you can choose to listen/speak with this home security camera and start to communicate with your family/pet at anytime anywhere.

3. Motion Detection --- Motion Detection with push alert notifications based on motion sensing technology.Receive real-time activity alerts of this indoor camera while you're out. Motion detection sensibility can be adjusted by yourself, When the camera detected abnormity or alarm is triggered, instant alerts will be sent to you.

4. Pan/Tilt/Zoom Function for Multiple-View --- wifi camera provides horizontal 350° and vertical 80°rotation with 4x digital zoom function for a complete coverage of your home. Camera can be shared to others,thus you can enjoy sweet memories with your family by using this security camera system.

5. P2P Tech With Safe Data --- Remotely access to your smart surveillance camera feed to enjoy peace of mind when you're away. P2P Tech to ensure data is not stored in the server, it is saved locally. Safety is high because it does not leak out saved photos and recordings. Up to 128GB micro sd card(10 class) is supported via loop recording. Home surveillance camera can charge&record at the same time thus never worry about running out of battery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
